title: Info-Board Reborn 计分板插件 玩家进入后疯狂刷报错
txt_content:
如题

1.15.2 spigot核心
报错如下

[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: SuperPerms no group permissions.
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.milkbowl.vault.permission.plugins.Permission_SuperPerms.getPlayerGroups(Permission_SuperPerms.java:91)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.milkbowl.vault.permission.Permission.getPlayerGroups(Permission.java:637)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at com.infogroup.infoboard.api.Vault.getRank(Vault.java:24)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at com.infogroup.infoboard.scoreboard.Create.createScoreBoard(Create.java:38)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at com.infogroup.infoboard.scoreboard.Update.updateScoreBoard(Update.java:71)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at com.infogroup.infoboard.Timers.lambda$start$1(Timers.java:83)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_15_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:81)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_15_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:400)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:1036)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.DedicatedServer.b(DedicatedServer.java:406)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:984)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:824)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
[18:13:44] [Server thread/WARN]: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: SuperPerms no group permissions.



就这样一直疯狂刷
求大佬解决方法

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
装了权限插件吗
没装的话去装一个
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=676818

wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-22 18:28
装了权限插件吗
没装的话去装一个
